review: stopped watching the show years before this game came out but still bought it back when it was new a decade later and im now on my fourth or fifth replay and still thoroughly enjoying it  in addition to being one of the rare licensed games that accurately captures the feel of its ip stick of truth is just a mechanically good rpg the combat exploration and character building are all satisfying and surprisingly deep
